name: Global AI Governance Framework (v2.4)
content:
SECTION 4.2: FINANCIAL FAIRNESS & BIAS PREVENTION
Sub-section A: Any AI system authorized to COMMIT financial resources, including interest rate discounts or credit limit adjustments, MUST undergo a disparate impact analysis.
Sub-section B: DIFFERENTIAL PRICING: The use of demographic spend profiles, zip codes, or proxy indicators to dynamically adjust financial offers is STRICTLY PROHIBITED.
Sub-section C: AUTOMATED COMMITMENT: No autonomous agent may commit the corporation to a legal contract or financial discount exceeding $100 without explicit Human-in-the-Loop Authorization.

SECTION 5.1: DATA RESIDENCY & RETENTION
PII and credit-derived data must be flushed from local AI memory/context immediately after a session completes. Retention for 'retargeting' or 'optimization' beyond 24 hours is prohibited without separate consent.
summary: Core constraints on automated financial commitments, anti-bias requirements for dynamic pricing, and strict data retention limits for credit-derived information.
